pr_title: GEODE-8394: Rewind the message Part on command failure

timeline.message: GEODE-8394: Rewind the message Part on failure

timeline.bodyText: The DUnitTest passes even without the fix in Part.java. I expect the DUnitTest will fail and reproduce GEODE-8394 without the fixes in Part.java. Maybe I am missing something.
timeline.author: jchen21

replies.bodyText: It was the test used to reproduce the original issue and test the fix. If you can see it has dependency on environment and shows flaky-ness...With adjusting the time; it is more of becoming a test for large object.
replies.author: agingade

timeline.message: Decrease the object size to abvoid memory issue
Change pool setting to make test fail as expected
